desc: Grower's Secret has been manufacturing and supplying organic fertilizers to farms for the past 24 years. Our fertilizers are OMRI listed and CDFA approved so you can trust your highest standards will be met. Check out our best seller Grower's Secret Nitrogen, derived from soy-beans and packed full of amino acids!

layout.text: Organic Fertilizers That Are Pure And Proven, Reducing Your Risk Come Rain or Shine
Maximize the potential of every crop with Grower's Secret Innovative Organic Solutions.
